Reviews.Title: Awesome Product
Reviews.Author: michelle.edwards
Reviews.Content: My product was in excellent condition and I received it in a weeks worth of time. I use my camera daily and it is absolutely amazing. Great product, great condition, great delivery. Just overall very pleased with this item and the producer.

Reviews.Title: Fancy Camera
Reviews.Author: r.barney
Reviews.Content: I had been wanting a "nice" camera for a really long time and finally just decided to bite the bullet and purchase one. This camera is amazing!! Very user friendly, which is nice when you are starting out. I ordered late the Friday before Thanksgiving and received it the following Wednesday!! Talk about awesome shipping time. I was so excited. The only thing that failed for work in this package for me was the card reader. Everything else was in perfect condition. I registered my camera and lens on the Nikon website (do this as soon as you open your package because there is a time window.) This is an amazing deal and a great bang for your buck.

Reviews.Title: Excellent choice
Reviews.Author: Randyroo "crazyr1010"
Reviews.Content: After giving up my trusty Canon F-1, an ancient film camera from the 1970's I wanted the same type of performance from a D-SLR. The Nikon D-3200 fits the bill with A/P, S/P, manual and auto modes, though I am still learning how to change aperture, shutter speed, etc. through software instead of turning a knob. The principle is the same just taking a bit of time to get used to. Image quality is excellent even when enlarged to ridiculous proportions. Cameta Camera has an excellent package if you are in the market for this camera, and you cannot beat the price. The same camera plus the 55-200 mm lens costs as much at Walmart as the entire package from Cameta without the bag, tripod, extra lenses, cleaning kit etc.Excellent service and delivered on time.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Starter Bundle
Reviews.Author: sme168 "sme168"
Reviews.Content: I've upgraded from a point-and-shoot camera to a DSLR. I wanted the Nikon D3200 because it came highly recommended by a friend, has great reviews, and the specifications are exactly what I need to take my photography to the next level.I came across the Cameta Camera bundle and it is a wonderful deal--good prices and good equipment.Before purchasing this deal, I looked Cameta Camera up on the BBB.org website--I was pleased to see they have an A+ rating. I placed my order on Saturday evening and the package was at my door by Tuesday--that's fast shipping! The box was nicely packaged, everything is new, and I would do business again with Cameta Camera.

Reviews.Title: Beginner's Delight
Reviews.Author: snehajha
Reviews.Content: I am so glad I bought this at the right time (thanksgiving). I think I was dreaming to own an SLR for over an year and what a purchase this one has been. The package as so many accessories that I can't even comprehend when I would actually get to use all of that. For now, I am in love with my D3200 RED DSLR and I beginning to learn how to use it. It is so beginner friendly that one can learn most of the stuff by themselves. The camera is gorgeous. The packaging was impeccable. The lenses make the camera look even more appealing. Once I learn how to use all those features, I am definately going to buy a 55-300mm lens. Thumbs up to this dealer for coming up with such an amazing scheme.I really want to post a picture of it which I took and added to my Facebook and it recieved many likes. I can post it here too but I don't know how to.

Reviews.Title: Nikon D3200 bundle Pack
Reviews.Author: Christopher M. Carter
Reviews.Content: This Bundle pack was excellent for a starter package it provide everything and more that a noob to photography needed to learn. I purchased this for my wife for Christmas i wanted to get a nice camera for her to start to learn to take picture with. it came with 2 lenses normal and a zoom lens the ultraviolet filter to help picture clarity overall it was money well spent.

Reviews.Title: I really like this camera.
Reviews.Author: David Johnson
Reviews.Content: The color is good, the features are pretty good,(being a starter it is a bit controlling of what you want compared to what it thinks is best), great detail pics if used properly. I would buy again at the price point for a good camera for home use.

Reviews.Title: Saturday and Sunday are not transit days.?
Reviews.Author: sylvie anderson
Reviews.Content: Excuses Excuses - Fedex will deliver on Saturday if you know how.I would think if someone does "1 day shipping" for 99.95 that you would use this option but I guess that would kill your shipping profit.BTW your shipping band is based on what?  I know the 4000 - 5000 band you charge 99.95 for is not the worth or cost of the item being shipped.

Reviews.Title: I love my Nikon D3200
Reviews.Author: Ashesofyou
Reviews.Content: I highly recommend the Nikon D3200. its an awesome camera and everything that comes in the kit is a bonus, Great deal !!!!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Misty Whitlock
Reviews.Content: best camera I ever had. had it 6 months and my moms house was robbed and they got off with my pride and joy also. I am heartbroken. miss it so much

Reviews.Title: Totally awesome camera!
Reviews.Author: Barbara J Bredel
Reviews.Content: Perfect camera for me. Lots of megapixels, and I can point and shoot, or I can turn off all the auto settings and learn to be a photographer. Love the extra lens. Probably my best purchase of the decade!

Reviews.Title: Great Package Deal
Reviews.Author: cherbear85
Reviews.Content: I really loved this package.  I wanted to buy my first DSLR and had decided on the Nikon d3200.  I was looking to get the best deal for the camera and accessories I considered to be necessary (the case and the extra zoom lens).  I found this package to be extremely reasonable in price for how many things you get and everything came very quickly!  I ordered my camera on a Wednesday and had it by Monday afternoon (I chose two-day shipping).  Everything was packaged well and works perfectly!  I couldn't be happier with my new camera.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't ask for a better camera!!!
Reviews.Author: KELLI SCHNELL
Reviews.Content: I love taking my pictures with this camera.  As I am not a professional and this is probably way out of my range of options that it has but, I am still learning and love the quality of this camera and the pictures it takes.

Reviews.Title: Awesome package deal
Reviews.Author: Lisa M Caniff
Reviews.Content: I love my new camera , I'm still figuring out how to use all the lenses , but I love the package deal it was a good value.

Reviews.Title: D3200
Reviews.Author: Bradley D. Johnson
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures. I like that we can edit the pictures on the camera itself. Lots more to learn though!

Reviews.Title: WOW!
Reviews.Author: V. Stiles
Reviews.Content: Wow, wow, wow! I decided to purchase this kit after my Nikon D80 went out on me. After doing a lot of research I figured this was the best deal, and I was right! The kit arrived in a huge box! I wasn't for sure what it was since it was so big! I spent the better half of my afternoon taking everything out of the box and trying to stuff it all in my camera bag (I decided to use my old camera backpack instead of the one that comes with it). Everything is exceptional quality! I have already played with it, using the different lenses and the different filters and have not been disappointed. It has taken a little getting used to the difference between this one and the D80. This is the first time that I've seen a camera that is so beautiful that I've wanted to take pictures of it.Pros:Do I have to narrow it down? Like it was one big box of prosCons:Nothing at all.Keep up the great work Nikon.

Reviews.Title: Great Deals!
Reviews.Author: Tink
Reviews.Content: Great deals! save lot money.... Can't think of anything goes within... It's all in one package with great price! Love it! ;)

Reviews.Title: Really nice camera and accessories!
Reviews.Author: Travis Willhoite
Reviews.Content: This camera and the accessories included are great! Soon after purchasing this camera, my wife and I went on a trip to Boston and got MANY excellent pictures!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: James W Burton Jr
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera. It takes awsome pictures. Love it! The picture quality is by far better than any point and shoot camera. Easy to use. This package was a great value, have not seen a better price anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Rick Grieser
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife and we both love it. This is our first SLR and for us it has been great.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: bob
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my wife and she can not put it down. It takes amazing pictures and has more options than you will ever need.

Reviews.Title: User friendly. Taking great pictures for my first time ever.  Extra lenses are fun to use.
Reviews.Author: Becky Hitchcock
Reviews.Content: I have always used the little digital cameras because I was intimidated by these more complex cameras.  The Nikon 3200 however is very user friendly without having to review an encyclopedia or taking a class. I love the extra lenses and am having a great experimenting with them. I love this camera.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera!
Reviews.Author: Joe  Ray Beltran
Reviews.Content: I bought this package because for just about $100 more than what the camera cost alone, you get a lot of cool extras. It is VERY easy to use and I am always receiving compliments on how it looks.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Susan Liddell "cats, dogs, birds and too many...
Reviews.Content: I've had Fuji for years but decided to try this. Easy to start using right away. I like that it won't let you take pictures that are too close. Not that it makes any difference in the quality of the shot, but the red camera body is kind of neat and easily identifiable.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 12 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D3200 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm G VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens (Red) + <2> Nikon 55-200mm VR DX AF-S Lens + <3> Transcend 16GB Class10 SD Card +
<4> Nikon Digital SLR Camera Case + <5> Vivitar 52mm UV Glass Filter + <6> Additional Vivitar 52mm UV Glass Filter +
<7> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens + <8> Precision Design 57" Tripod + <9> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader +
<10> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <11> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <12> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D3200 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm G VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens (Red) + 55-200mm VR Lens + 16GB Card + Case + Filters + Tripod + Telephoto & Wide-Angle Lens Kit
